An eligible entity that receives a grant under this section shall use the grant funds to establish
			 non-traditional outreach programs and initiatives that may include the
			 following:
New or improved pre-college loan entrance counseling  and financial literacy sessions.
New or improved exit counseling for student loan borrowers.

Train students in how to use the National Student
			 Loan Data System established under

			 student has taken out a loan (which shall occur not earlier than half way
			 through completion of such academic program), which check-in shall provide
			 the borrower with an update on the borrower's student loan status and
			 information on how the outreach program can serve as an information
			 resource for the borrower.
